name: For Whom The Bell Tolls (drgvdg, clerium, Natasha Kononenko)
name_original: For Whom The Bell Tolls (drgvdg, clerium, Natasha Kononenko)
description:
You wake up in room and are told to pull a lever every 10 seconds. Unsure what else to do, you start pulling the lever and begin trying to figure out what’s going on.

Controls:

Point and Click

--------------------------------------

Made for the Ludum Dare 51, "Every Ten Seconds"

Programming by Diego Teran (https://clerium.itch.io) and Diego Gonzalez (https://drgvdg.itch.io)

Art by Natasha Kononenko

Game Design by Diego Gonzalez and Diego Teran

Writing by Diego Gonzalez

Additional Programming by Natasha Kononenko

-----------------------

Bug Fixes

We did a minor patch fixing some bugs with the original version, but the experience remains largely the same

- Fixed bugs with completing the game and returning back to it from the menu

- Fixed buggy mouse movement detection
